channel.title: Pretty Cool Video
channel.description:
Not a funny video so
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KFg_z-314Sc
Promoting my band, tell me what you think other then getting better mic quality.
Also, if you have any musical experience, what mics would you recommend getting ($100-200 range)

item.title: Pretty Cool Video
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:22, topic:417416”]I like it, sounds decent for no recording equipment.

I’m trying to sell my current double bass pedals to buy a new pair, and then I’m working on tuning my drums and buying a china cymbal. Why does drumming have to be so expensive?

Any tips on tuning drums? I’ve watched most of Bob Gatzen’s videos on youtube so when I attempt I’ll have those in some tabs on a laptop, but otherwise any other tips you or other drummers here can throw at me?[/quote]I’m not the drummer, but my brother is a professional drummer. He told me tuning will obviously come with experience. Or take it in to get tuned

Read full topic

item.title: Pretty Cool Video
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I like it, sounds decent for no recording equipment.

I’m trying to sell my current double bass pedals to buy a new pair, and then I’m working on tuning my drums and buying a china cymbal. Why does drumming have to be so expensive?

Any tips on tuning drums? I’ve watched most of Bob Gatzen’s videos on youtube so when I attempt I’ll have those in some tabs on a laptop, but otherwise any other tips you or other drummers here can throw at me?

Read full topic

item.title: Pretty Cool Video
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:20, topic:417416”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=519967.msg3778577#msg3778577 date=1318284376]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=519967.msg3778546#msg3778546 date=1318283087]

Get a new camera man. The camera moves with his exhale and inhale.
[/quote]^This guy didn’t read the thread at all.
[/quote]Yea i know. I read his post, then i posted, then i read the thread.

Yeah it was swinging from the punching bag, but we use a FlipHD.

Lol no harm done ;D

What do you play?[/quote]I play keys but normally I just work the soundboard and lights. My friend Caleb likes to play solo on the guitar and sing.

item.title: Pretty Cool Video
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Oh see we use a good 50k or more set up at our school, sound board and everything. So yeah XD But it did sound nice you need your sound a little bit louder though.

item.title: Pretty Cool Video
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:13, topic:417416”]Who was holding the camera?

Also you guys shouldn’t be so nervous of the camera also should space out the set up a bit, get monitors etc(Although I don’t know your budget.) I will get pictures of the set up I am able to use tomorrow, its in my schools music class.[/quote]It was our first time recording basically, we’ve played since then are a lot more relaxed. We put the camera on a punching bag, which was swinging through out it. We don’t have too big of a budget (roughly $200 usually, per 1-3 months)

Read full topic
